channel.title: Special Attacks + Special Bar (repost)
channel.description:
Im reposting this as my last one didn't get answered
1.If i weild my weapons that should have a special bar, they dont have one. how do i add it?
Once that is done im testing if there is specials on them, if not ill be asking
where do i add a special attack void if i dont have any special void already? alls i have is a special.java

item.title: Special Attacks + Special Bar (repost)
item.dc:creator: @areriahrahea areriahrahea
item.description:
@areriahrahea wrote:

It says my server class, but i have it =/

EDIT: i just realised i have no .class any more.

its because i had some error and only started so i re downloaded server files, but i compiled the server then i had the class files appear.
but when i compile now it doesnt work…

Read full topic

item.description:

and stuff… if you know what that is

item.title: Special Attacks + Special Bar (repost)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Add the ID of the weapon in your specials class for the bar to appear when wielded.

Read full topic
